headline: LHX- A "Triple Beat" Earnings Play in the Defense Sector
summary: While equity markets have staged a strong rebound from the April bottom, earnings estimates look to have just begun forming a bottom as the Q2 2025 earnings season unfolds. Meanwhile, L3Harris Technologies Inc. (LHX) delivered a triple play (beat, beat, raise) this quarter, observes Nancy Tengler, CIO at Laffer Tengler Investments.
